title: The Naked Bee Orange Blossom Honey Shampoo & Conditioner 6.7 Oz
description:
All the good stuff

•Organic Aloe Vera nourishes and conditions for healthy hair and scalp. 
•Panthenol helps give hair sheen, moisturizes and protects your hair. 
•Honey nourishes your hair and adds brilliance and balance. Spirulina, rich in protein and nutrients that make hair shiny and soft.
•Arnica extract improves circulation to hair roots and invigorates the scalp.

None of the bad stuff 

•Paraben-free. No propylene glycol. No dyes or pigments. No EDTA. Phthalate-free fragrance. No animal testing.

title: NYX Doll Eye Mascara, Extreme Black,  Volume,  DE02, 0.28 oz
description: Hello doll-face! For irresistibly fluttery eyelashes, try this mascara on for size. Doll eye mascara uses a unique blend of natural oils, vitamin E and nylon fibers to extend eyelashes to almost faux proportions. This mascara will add the volume in your lashes that you desire.

title: DevaCurl No-Poo Zero Lather Conditioning Cleanser 12.0 oz
description: Buy DevaConcepts Hair Conditioners - DevaCurl No-Poo Zero Lather Conditioning Cleanser 12.0 oz. How-to-Use: Wet hair thoroughly. Apply a generous amount directly tot he scalp to cleanse, stimulate and remove dirt particles.
